main event: A man observed a bright light land on the highway while he was working on his truck near Howard Lake, Minnesota.
interesting points: The object was approximately 75 feet long and 30 feet wide., It made a loud whistling noise which was audible from inside the truck., A man dressed in a silver blue suit and a bulbous helmet emerged from the object., The entire encounter lasted about 4 minutes., The Air Force concluded that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
witness description: A 32-year-old man working for the Gleason Construction Company.
